article.title: Draper Labs Awarded Navy Contract Worth $157 Million
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Charles Stark Draper Laboratory Incorporated is being awarded a $157 million cost-plus-incentive-fee, cost-plus-fixed-fee contract by the U.S. Navy for services supporting the TRIDENT II (D-5) weapons system. Services include but are not limited to specialized tactical engineering services, logistics services, fleet support services and guidance repair services to test, repair and maintain guidance subsystems, test equipment and related support equipment.
